law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 20, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 158, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 13.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Purchase of books from pupil moving from district.
